attributes.action: Have the national anthem of the UK played at all domestic sport matches
attributes.additional_details: In line with other commonwealth countries, this petition proposes that the UK National Anthem (God Save the Queen) be played at the beginning of all domestic and international matches in all sports, whether friendlies or league matches. This should apply to matches in all parts of the United Kingdom, however, additional regional anthems (Flower of Scotland, Land of our Fathers etc) may be played before God Save the Queen but not in place of the UK Anthem.
